snippet: GRUEN--John. The Keith Haring Foundation Board of Trustees and staff mourn the passing of friend and Haring biographer John Gruen. We extend our sincere condolences and heartfelt sympathy to his daughter and our dear friend, Executive Director Jul...
lead_paragraph: GRUEN--John. The Keith Haring Foundation Board of Trustees and staff mourn the passing of friend and Haring biographer John Gruen. We extend our sincere condolences and heartfelt sympathy to his daughter and our dear friend, Executive Director Julia Gruen. 1/3
